background.title: Journey
points:
I've always been curious about how people think, decide, and behave.
That curiosity pulled me toward problem-solving, systems, and decision-loops — not just code.

At IIT, I started seeing patterns in behaviour, systems, and technology.
Tech became less about features, and more about how decisions are made, repeated, and improved.

Over time, I realised my work sits at the intersection of
people · product · engineering —
and I enjoy building where technology reduces friction and improves real-world outcomes.

items.description:
Built foundations in systems, scalability, and first-principles problem-solving.
Learned to break complexity into clear, actionable product and technical decisions.

Built reliable, cost-optimised backend systems — caching, Redis pipelines, infra optimisation.
**4× faster** response times and **~10% lower cloud costs**, while keeping systems stable and compliant.

Co-led platform architecture and built a dynamic proposal engine.
Reduced manual effort by **~25%** and aligned engineering + product around roadmap outcomes.
Connected **technical execution → measurable business value** across teams.

Designed the Rivo OS workflow for mortgage specialists, focusing on review, triage, and decision checkpoints.
Removed duplicate inputs and unnecessary handoffs — **~30% reduction** in effort per case.
**Fewer steps. Faster decisions. Higher case-throughput** across the team.
